verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> again to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> say<WH559> to the prince<WH5057> of Tyrus,<WH6865> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because<WH3282> your heart<WH3820> is lifted<WH1361> up, and you have said,<WH559> I am a God,<WH410> I sit<WH3427> in the seat<WH4186> of God,<WH430> in the middle<WH3820> of the seas;<WH3220> yet you are a man,<WH120> and not God,<WH410> though you set<WH5414> your heart<WH3820> as the heart<WH3820> of God:<WH430>
Behold,<WH2009> you are wiser<WH2450> than Daniel;<WH1840> there is no<WH3808> secret<WH5640> that they can hide<WH6004> from you:
With your wisdom<WH2451> and with your understanding<WH8394> you have gotten<WH6213> you riches,<WH2428> and have gotten<WH6213> gold<WH2091> and silver<WH3701> into your treasures:<WH214>
By your great<WH7230> wisdom<WH2451> and by your traffic<WH7404> have you increased<WH7235> your riches,<WH2428> and your heart<WH3824> is lifted<WH1361> up because of your riches:<WH2428>
Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because<WH3282> you have set<WH5414> your heart<WH3820> as the heart<WH3820> of God;<WH430>

Behold,<WH2005> therefore<WH3651> I will bring<WH935> strangers<WH2114> on you, the terrible<WH6184> of the nations:<WH1471> and they shall draw<WH7324> their swords<WH2719> against<WH5921> the beauty<WH3308> of your wisdom,<WH2451> and they shall defile<WH2490> your brightness.<WH3314>
They shall bring<WH3381> you down<WH3381> to the pit,<WH7845> and you shall die<WH4191> the deaths<WH4463> of them that are slain<WH2491> in the middle<WH3820> of the seas.<WH3220>
Will you yet<WH559> say<WH559> before<WH6440> him that slays<WH2026> you, I am God?<WH430> but you shall be a man,<WH120> and no<WH3808> God,<WH410> in the hand<WH3027> of him that slays<WH2490> you.
You shall die<WH4191> the deaths<WH4194> of the uncircumcised<WH6189> by the hand<WH3027> of strangers:<WH2114> for I have spoken<WH1696> it, said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> take<WH5375> up a lamentation<WH7015> on the king<WH4428> of Tyrus,<WH6865> and say<WH559> to him, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> You seal<WH2856> up the sum,<WH8508> full<WH4392> of wisdom,<WH2451> and perfect<WH3632> in beauty.<WH3308>

You have been<WH1961> in Eden<WH5731> the garden<WH1588> of God;<WH430> every<WH3605> precious<WH3368> stone<WH68> was your covering,<WH4540> the sardius,<WH124> topaz,<WH6357> and the diamond,<WH3095> the beryl,<WH8658> the onyx,<WH7718> and the jasper,<WH3471> the sapphire,<WH5601> the emerald,<WH5306> and the carbuncle,<WH1304> and gold:<WH2091> the workmanship<WH4399> of your tabrets<WH8596> and of your pipes<WH5345> was prepared<WH3559> in you in the day<WH3117> that you were created.<WH1254>

You are the anointed<WH4473> cherub<WH3742> that covers;<WH5526> and I have set<WH5414> you so: you were<WH1961> on the holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022> of God;<WH430> you have walked<WH1980> up and down in the middle<WH8432> of the stones<WH68> of fire.<WH784>
You were perfect<WH8549> in your ways<WH1870> from the day<WH3117> that you were created,<WH1254> till<WH5704> iniquity<WH5766> was found<WH4672> in you.

By the multitude<WH7230> of your merchandise<WH7404> they have filled<WH4390> the middle<WH8432> of you with violence,<WH2555> and you have sinned:<WH2398> therefore I will cast<WH2490> you as profane<WH2490> out of the mountain<WH2022> of God:<WH430> and I will destroy<WH6> you, O covering<WH5526> cherub,<WH3742> from the middle<WH8432> of the stones<WH68> of fire.<WH784>

Your heart<WH3820> was lifted<WH1361> up because of your beauty,<WH3308> you have corrupted<WH7843> your wisdom<WH2451> by reason<WH5921> of your brightness:<WH3314> I will cast<WH7993> you to the ground,<WH776> I will lay<WH5414> you before<WH6440> kings,<WH4428> that they may behold<WH7200> you.

You have defiled<WH2490> your sanctuaries<WH4720> by the multitude<WH7230> of your iniquities,<WH5771> by the iniquity<WH5766> of your traffic;<WH7404> therefore will I bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> a fire<WH784> from the middle<WH8432> of you, it shall devour<WH398> you, and I will bring<WH5414> you to ashes<WH665> on the earth<WH776> in the sight<WH5869> of all<WH3605> them that behold<WH7200> you.
All<WH3605> they that know<WH3045> you among the people<WH5971> shall be astonished<WH8074> at<WH5921> you: you shall be a terror,<WH1091> and never<WH5704> <WH5769> shall you be any more.
Again the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> against<WH413> Zidon,<WH6721> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> it,

And say,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I am against<WH5921> you, O Zidon;<WH6721> and I will be glorified<WH3513> in the middle<WH8432> of you: and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> when I shall have executed<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in her, and shall be sanctified<WH6942> in her.

For I will send<WH7971> into her pestilence,<WH1698> and blood<WH1818> into her streets;<WH2351> and the wounded<WH2491> shall be judged<WH5307> in the middle<WH8432> of her by the sword<WH2719> on her on every<WH5437> side;<WH5439> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>

And there shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> a pricking<WH3992> brier<WH5544> to the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> nor any grieving<WH3510> thorn<WH6975> of all<WH3605> that are round<WH5439> about them, that despised<WH7590> them; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> When I shall have gathered<WH6908> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> from the people<WH5971> among whom<WH834> they are scattered,<WH6327> and shall be sanctified<WH6942> in them in the sight<WH5869> of the heathen,<WH1471> then shall they dwell<WH3427> in their land<WH127> that I have given<WH5414> to my servant<WH5650> Jacob.<WH3290>

And they shall dwell<WH3427> safely<WH983> therein,<WH5921> and shall build<WH1129> houses,<WH1004> and plant<WH5193> vineyards;<WH3754> yes, they shall dwell<WH3427> with confidence,<WH983> when I have executed<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on all<WH3605> those that despise<WH7590> them round<WH5439> about them; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> their God.<WH430>
